alert.note: Alert for Greene (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 18 at 12:41AM EST until further notice by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Greene County, Ohio. * WHEN...Until 1000 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1241 AM EST, local law enforcement reported flooding in the warned area. - Some locations that may experience flooding include... Kettering, Beavercreek, Huber Heights, Fairborn, Xenia, Bellbrook, Yellow Springs, Wright-Patterson Afb, Cedarville, Jamestown, Wilberforce, New Jasper, Spring Valley, Bowersville, Clifton, Centerville, Oldtown, Trebein, John Bryan State Park and Greene County Airport.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. To report flooding, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
